questions.question: Where is an expected or necessary structural element absent (null force) in the evaluand?

Where is an expected constraint or limitation absent (null force), allowing unexpected freedom or chaos?
Where is an expected driving force or motivation absent (null force), leading to inaction or deviation?
Where does the absence of an expected link or transition create a discontinuity (null force)?
Where is an expected point of tension or conflict absent (null force), potentially leading to stagnation?
